column1: Figure 6. Percent of local jails reporting one or more deaths, by number of deaths, 2000–2019
Report title: Mortality in Local Jails, 2000–2019 – Statistical Tables   NCJ 301368

Author: E. Ann Carson, Ph.D., BJS Statistician
Figure 6. Percent of local jails reporting one or more deaths, by number of deaths, 2000–2019
Note: Data may have been revised from previously published statistics. Includes all local jails that reported data on populations or deaths. See Methodology. See table 17 for percentages.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Mortality in Correctional Institutions, 2000–2019.
